name: AS_GSS_TMG_FM_importReferenceTasks
description: Main wrapper interface for task import functionality
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!taskImportDocument,
  local!allImportedTasks,
  local!importStep: 1,
  local!taskTypes: rule!AS_GSS_TMG_QE_getTaskBehaviorTypes(
    configurationLevelCode: cons!AS_GSS_TMG_ENUM_TASK_CONFIGURATION_LEVEL_CODE_AD_HOC
  ),
  local!taskCategories: rule!AS_GSS_TMG_QE_getTaskCategories(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY
  ),
  local!documentTypes: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getRefDataByTypes(
    refTypes: cons!AS_GSS_REF_TYPE_DOCUMENT_TYPE,
    excludeRefDataIds: rule!AS_GSS_BL_documentTypesToExcludeFromSelectionOnUpload()
  ),
  local!documentTemplates: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getRefDocumentTemplate(isActive: true),
  {
    choose(
      local!importStep,
      rule!AS_GSS_TMG_CPS_importReferenceTasksFileUpload(
        i18nData: ri!i18nData,
        allImportedTasks: local!allImportedTasks,
        taskImportDocument: local!taskImportDocument,
        importStep: local!importStep,
        selectedSubAction: ri!selectedSubAction,
        taskTypes: local!taskTypes,
        taskCategories: local!taskCategories,
        documentTypes: local!documentTypes,
        documentTemplates: local!documentTemplates
      ),
      rule!AS_GSS_TMG_GRD_manageImportReferenceTasksGrid(
        i18nData: ri!i18nData,
        allImportedTasks: local!allImportedTasks,
        selectedSubAction: ri!selectedSubAction,
        importStep: local!importStep,
        taskImportDocument: local!taskImportDocument,
        selectedTemplate: ri!selectedTemplate,
        taskCategories: local!taskCategories,
        documentTypes: local!documentTypes,
        documentTemplates: local!documentTemplates
      )
    )
  }
)
